name: Banff Forest Expedition
summary: Scenic hiking trails through the breathtaking Banff National Park in Canada.
description: Discover the beauty of Banff with guided hikes, hidden waterfalls, and breathtaking viewpoints. This tour is perfect for nature lovers and photography enthusiasts seeking a peaceful yet adventurous escape.

name: Atlantic Coast Explorer
summary: Explore the U.S. East Coast by land and sea.
description: Experience iconic lighthouses, pristine beaches, and sailing adventures along the Atlantic Coast. A mix of relaxation and exploration, this tour is ideal for travelers who enjoy the ocean breeze and coastal culture.

name: Alpine Snow Adventure
summary: Skiing, snowboarding, and winter thrills in the Alps.
description: An adrenaline-filled getaway in the snow. Perfect for adventurers who love skiing, snowboarding, and après-ski culture. Includes guided activities and cozy mountain lodges.

name: Urban Explorer: USA
summary: Discover the most iconic U.S. cities in one tour.
description: From New York’s skyline to San Francisco’s Golden Gate, this journey covers America’s most vibrant cities. Enjoy local food, culture, nightlife, and iconic landmarks with expert guides.

name: National Parks Camping
summary: Camp in the most stunning U.S. National Parks.
description: A nature-filled adventure covering Yosemite, Yellowstone, and the Grand Canyon. Enjoy stargazing, campfires, and hiking trails while staying close to nature.

name: Extreme Sports Escape
summary: A two-week adrenaline rush: surfing, skydiving, climbing and more.
description: For thrill-seekers only! From surfing to skydiving, this extreme package takes you across beaches, cliffs, and mountains with expert instructors ensuring safety and excitement.

name: Wine & Vineyards Tour
summary: Exclusive wine tasting across scenic vineyards.
description: Sip world-class wines in beautiful vineyards, enjoy fine dining, and explore charming countryside towns. Perfect for couples and foodies looking for a luxury getaway.

name: Stargazing Adventure
summary: The best remote spots to witness the night sky.
description: Travel far from the city lights to witness the Milky Way in its full glory. This tour offers desert camping, mountain hikes, and professional astronomy sessions.

name: Aurora Borealis Escape
summary: Witness the magical Northern Lights in Iceland.
description: A once-in-a-lifetime chance to experience the dancing lights of the Aurora Borealis. Includes guided night excursions, hot springs visits, and cozy stays in Icelandic cabins.

name: Sahara Desert Expedition
summary: Camel rides, golden dunes, and starry nights in the Sahara.
description: Ride camels, watch the sun set over endless dunes, and sleep under the stars in traditional desert camps. A perfect mix of cultural immersion and natural beauty.
